title: Newsletter, "Design for Bohemian Life Newsletter, July 11, 1940", 1940
medium: Lithography in red and blue ink on off-white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on the cover across the center in blue ink: BOHEMIAN LIFE/ AS SEEN BY SAVARIN ST. SURE/ PUBLISHED BY BOHEMIAN DISTRIBUTING CO. 2254 EAST FORTY-NINTH STREE LOS ANGELES
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The top portion of the cover has a red and blue geometric design. The date is printed at the upper left. The newsletter discusses cooking and recipes. There is text on all four sides of the fold-out.

tombstone.epitaph: Newsletter, "Design for Bohemian Life Newsletter, July 11, 1940", 1940. Lithography in red and blue ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-159-2.
